com.facebook.buck.util.versioncontrol

Interface VersionControlCmdLineInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HgCmdLineInterface, NoOpCmdLineInterface

    public interface VersionControlCmdLineInterface
    Provides meta-data about the version control repository the project being built is using.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<String,String> bookmarksRevisionsId(com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> bookmarks)
      It receives a list of bookmarks and returns a map of bookmarks to revision ids.
      com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> changedFiles(String fromRevisionId)

      String currentRevisionId()

      boolean isSupportedVersionControlSystem()

      long timestampSeconds(String revisionId) 

    • Method Detail

      • isSupportedVersionControlSystem

        boolean isSupportedVersionControlSystem()
        Returns:
        true if project is using version control, and we support it (i.e. hg)

      • revisionId

        String revisionId(String name)
           throws VersionControlCommandFailedException,
                  InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        name - Bookmark name, e.g. master
        Returns:
        Global revision ID for given name
        Throws:
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
        InterruptedException

      • revisionIdOrAbsent

        Optional<String> revisionIdOrAbsent(String name)
                             throws InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        name - Bookmark name, e.g master
        Returns:
        Global revision ID for given name or Optional.empty() if the bookmark doesn't exist or an error was encountered. If you want to handle the exception use revisionId(String)
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • currentRevisionId

        String currentRevisionId()
                  throws VersionControlCommandFailedException,
                         InterruptedException
        Returns:
        Revision ID for current tip
        Throws:
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
        InterruptedException

      • commonAncestor

        String commonAncestor(String revisionIdOne,
                      String revisionIdTwo)
               throws VersionControlCommandFailedException,
                      InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        revisionIdOne -
        revisionIdTwo -
        Returns:
        Revision ID that is an ancestor for both revisionIdOne and revisionIdTwo
        Throws:
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
        InterruptedException

      • commonAncestorOrAbsent

        Optional<String> commonAncestorOrAbsent(String revisionIdOne,
                                        String revisionIdTwo)
                                 throws InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        revisionIdOne -
        revisionIdTwo -
        Returns:
        Revision ID that is an ancestor for both revisionIdOne and revisionIdTwo or Optional.empty() is there is no common ancestor or an error was encountered. If you want to handle the error use commonAncestor(String, String)
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • diffBetweenRevisions

        String diffBetweenRevisions(String baseRevision,
                            String tipRevision)
                     throws VersionControlCommandFailedException,
                            InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        baseRevision -
        tipRevision -
        Returns:
        the produced diff between two revisions
        Throws:
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
        InterruptedException

      • changedFiles

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> changedFiles(String fromRevisionId)
                                                     throws VersionControlCommandFailedException,
                                                            InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        fromRevisionId -
        Returns:
        files changed from the given revision.
        Throws:
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
        InterruptedException

      • timestampSeconds

        long timestampSeconds(String revisionId)
               throws VersionControlCommandFailedException,
                      InterruptedException
        Parameters:
        revisionId -
        Returns:
        Unix timestamp of given revisionId (in seconds)
        Throws:
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
        InterruptedException

      • bookmarksRevisionsId

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<String,String> bookmarksRevisionsId(com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> bookmarks)
                                                                    throws InterruptedException,
                                                                           VersionControlCommandFailedException
        It receives a list of bookmarks and returns a map of bookmarks to revision ids.
        Returns:
        a map of bookmark to revision id.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
        VersionControlCommandFailedException
